oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Highlander Seminar: Labor Unions Need Teachers, Librarians, Writers, Secretaries, Research Workers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Flyer advertising labor workshops for white collar workers. The flyer explains why these professionals are important to the labor union's functions and what sort of training is offered at Highlander.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Labor unions--Organizing--United States; Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); White collar workers; Labor unions; Labor movement; Seminars; Congress of Industrial Organizations (U.S.); Labor unions and education; Labor leaders; Cooperative schools; Labor unions--Officials and employees; Recreation; Writers' workshops
